SELECT <#list columnInfoList as item> ${tableNameAbbr}.${item.columnNameDb}, </#list> FROM ${tableName} ${tableNameAbbr}
${tableNameAbbr}.is_deleted=0 <#list queryColumnInfoList as item> <#if item.columnTypeJava = "Integer">
AND ${tableNameAbbr}.${item.columnNameDb} = ${r"#"}{filter.${item.columnNameJavaLower}}
<#else>
AND ${tableNameAbbr}.${item.columnNameDb} LIKE CONCAT( '%', ${r"#"}{filter.${item.columnNameJavaLower}} , '%' )
</#if> </#list>
ORDER BY ${tableNameAbbr}.update_time DESC
